body.p: If you were to pick one of the 1,200 surveyed students at random, he/she would most likely find it easier to make friends with which of the following?

multiple_choice.choice: People of the same or opposite sex equally

response.feedback: Incorrect. People of the same sex was the response given the least often (13.7%).
Incorrect. People of the opposite sex was not the response given the most often (36.2%).
Correct. No difference, or people of the same or opposite sex, was the response that was given most often (50.2%).

part.hint: Which of the possible responses was given most often?
